speaker: HELPDESK
message:
Ok since you haven't pin down your scope of this topic you may want to use library search box using keywords searches. Keywords you can think about are stockings, fashion, culture, society etc. You can combine those keywords together to form different search strings and try others as well e.g., politics, western, eastern etc.

Or you can try some databases e.g., passport, marketline, statista.

speaker: HELPDESK
